mapper.sql: id, user_name, ip, type, text, param, create_time
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_log
id,
user_name,
ip,
type,
text,
param,
create_time,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{text,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{param,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update sys_log
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
text = #{text,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
param = #{param,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sys_log set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, text = #{text,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, param = #{param,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT from sys_log
and user_name like "%" #{userName} "%" and type like "%" #{type} "%"
ORDER BY create_time desc
